title: PurchasePulse
description: An interactive machine learning dashboard that predicts retail customer repurchasing based on key indicators — empowering marketing and sales teams with actionable insights.

title: FightMetricsAI
description: Unlock deeper fight insights with an automated platform that scrapes, cleans, and analyzes 60K+ UFC stats. FightMetrics AI delivers bettor-beating predictions using XGBoost models, real-time data pipelines, and visual dashboards powered by R — built for analysts, bettors, and fight strategists alike.

title: E-commerce Demo
description: Demo store showcasing shopping cart functionality.
